text: Monster's Ball is a 2001 American romantic drama movie directed by Marc Forster and starring Billy Bob Thornton, Halle Berry, Heath Ledger, Peter Boyle, Sean Combs, Mos Def. It was distributed by Lionsgate Films and was nominated for 2 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 2002. ==Other websites== * * Category:2001 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Marc Forster Category:Movies set in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Movies featuring a Best Actress Academy Award-winning performance
title: Monster's Ball
